titles.title: You may have the joy bell

verse.name: c1a
c1b
v1a
verse.lines:
You may have joy-bells
ringing in your heart,
And a peace that from
you never will depart;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Walk the straight and narrow way,
Live for Jesus ev’ry day,
He will keep the joy-bells
ringing in your heart.

verse.name: v2a
v2b
verse.lines:
Words of kindness always say,
Deeds of mercy do each day,
Then He’ll keep the joy-bells ringing in your heart.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
You will meet with trials as you journey home; Grace sufficient He will give to overcome;
Tho’ unseen by mortal eye,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
He is with you ever nigh,
And He’ll keep the joy-bells
ringing in your heart.

verse.name: v4a
v4b
verse.lines:
Sinners you can help to win
If you're life is pure and clean,
And you will keep the joy-bells ringing in your heart.
